languages.text: "Просто бизнес. Честный, прямолинейный. Футфол — гнездо бандитов и торгашей, пусть и не являющихся явными еретиками, но далеких от света Империума. Они должны быть довольны, что Вольные Торговцы вообще позволяют этому гнезду существовать. Требовать с них справедливую оплату — исключительно правильный поступок".

"It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be grateful that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."
languages.original_text: "Просто бизнес. Честный, прямолинейный. Футфол — гнездо бандитов и торгашей, пусть и не являющихся явными еретиками, но далеких от света Империума. Они должны быть довольны, что Вольные Торговцы вообще позволяют этому гнезду существовать. Требовать с них справедливую оплату — исключительно правильный поступок".

traits.locale_text: "It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be blatant heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be happy that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding a fair payment from them is absolutely the right thing to do."

"It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be blatant heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be happy that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding a fair payment from them is absolutely the right thing to do."

"It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be happy that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."

"It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be happy that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."

"It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be grateful that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."

languages.text: 「単なるビジネスです。それ以上でも、それ以下でもありません。フットフォールは盗賊と利益追求者の巣窟です。彼らは異端者ではないかもしれませんが、帝国の威光から遠く離れている。そもそも、自由開拓者が彼らの巣窟が存在するのを許してくださっていることに感謝するべきでしょう。彼らに正当な報酬を要求するのは当然のことだと思います」
languages.original_text: "It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be grateful that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."

traits.locale_text: 「単なるビジネスです。それ以上でも、それ以下でもありません。フットフォールは盗賊と利益追求者の巣窟です。彼らは異端者ではないかもしれませんが、帝国の威光から遠く離れている。そもそも、自由開拓者が彼らの巣窟が存在するのを許してくださっていることに感謝するべきでしょう。彼らに正当な報酬を要求するのは当然のことだと思います」

languages.text: “这不过是生意罢了，诚实而直白的生意。落脚港是强盗和奸商的巢穴，或许他们并不是彻头彻尾的异端分子，但也远远地偏离了帝国之光。这个巢穴能一直存在，他们早就该好好感激行商浪人的恩情的。因此，要求他们支付公平的价格，也是完全正确的事情。”
languages.original_text: "It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be grateful that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."

traits.locale_text: “这不过是生意罢了，诚实而直白的生意。落脚港是强盗和奸商的巢穴，或许他们并不是彻头彻尾的异端分子，但也远远地偏离了帝国之光。这个巢穴能一直存在，他们早就该好好感激行商浪人的恩情的。因此，要求他们支付公平的价格，也是完全正确的事情。”

languages.text: «Así son los negocios: sinceros y sin rodeos. Paso es un nido de bandidos y usureros. Puede que no sean el colmo de la herejía, pero están alejados de la luz del Imperium. Deberían dar las gracias por que los Comerciantes Independientes los dejen existir siquiera. Como mínimo se les debe exigir que abonen un pago justo».
languages.original_text: "It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be grateful that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."

traits.locale_text: «Así son los negocios: sinceros y sin rodeos. Paso es un nido de bandidos y usureros. Puede que no sean el colmo de la herejía, pero están alejados de la luz del Imperium. Deberían dar las gracias por que los Comerciantes Independientes los dejen existir siquiera. Como mínimo se les debe exigir que abonen un pago justo».

languages.text: « Il ne s'agit que de commerce. Du commerce pur et simple. Castel est un vil repaire de hors-la-loi et de profiteurs. Ce ne sont pas des hérétiques au sens strict, mais la lumière de l'Imperium ne semble pas les baigner. Ils devraient déjà se réjouir que les libres-marchands tolèrent l'existence de ce cloaque. Exiger un paiement adéquat de leur part me semble tout à fait approprié. »
languages.original_text: "It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be grateful that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne s'agit que de commerce. Du commerce pur et simple. Castel est un vil repaire de hors-la-loi et de profiteurs. Ce ne sont pas des hérétiques au sens strict, mais la lumière de l'Imperium ne semble pas les baigner. Ils devraient déjà se réjouir que les libres-marchands tolèrent l'existence de ce cloaque. Exiger un paiement adéquat de leur part me semble tout à fait approprié. »

languages.text: "Es geht lediglich ums Geschäft. Ehrlich und geradeheraus. Footfall ist ein Loch voller Banditen und Profiteure. Sie mögen zwar keine Ketzer sein, aber sie sind weit vom Licht des Imperiums entfernt. Sie sollten dankbar sein, dass Freihändler ihre Existenz überhaupt dulden. Dass sie dafür ordentlich bezahlen, ist nur fair."
languages.original_text: "It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be grateful that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."

traits.locale_text: "Es geht lediglich ums Geschäft. Ehrlich und geradeheraus. Footfall ist ein Loch voller Banditen und Profiteure. Sie mögen zwar keine Ketzer sein, aber sie sind weit vom Licht des Imperiums entfernt. Sie sollten dankbar sein, dass Freihändler ihre Existenz überhaupt dulden. Dass sie dafür ordentlich bezahlen, ist nur fair."

languages.text: "Bu bir iş. Dürüst ve şartları belli. Binliman, haydutların ve vurguncuların ini oldu. Kâfir değiller belki lakin İmparatorluk'un ışığından nasiplerini almadıkları da gün gibi ortada. Hür Tacirler bu suç yatağına müsamaha gösterdiği için yatıp kalkıp dua etmeliler. Bunun için makul bir ödeme talep etmek, en büyük hakkımız."
languages.original_text: "It's simply business. Honest and straightforward. Footfall is a den of bandits and profiteers. They may not be outright heretics, but they are far from the light of the Imperium. They should be grateful that Rogue Traders allow this den to exist in the first place. Demanding fair payment from them is only right."

traits.locale_text: "Ne fazla, ne eksik… Bu bir iş. Dürüst ve dolaysız. Binliman, haydutların ve vurguncuların ini oldu. Doğrudan kâfir olmayabilirler ancak İmparatorluk'un ışığından nasiplerini almadıkları da gün gibi ortada. Bu inin varlığına müsamaha gösterdikleri için Hür Tacirlere minnettar olmalılar. Âdil ödeme talep etmek, en büyük hakkımız."
